descript.abstract:
Route Segments represent road centerlines for all public roads within the state of Minnesota. The roads are broken from intersection to intersection and attributed with information based on their designated route. A description of the Roads layer is included in Section 5 of this document - Entity and Attribute Overview.
800 Routes 800 Routes are route segments that formerly were part of a trunk highway which was turned back. The turn back order did not cover the segments included in the 800 route so a permanent artificial number is assigned in the 800-899 range.
900 Routes 900 Routes are for route segments that formerly were part of a trunk highway which was turned back. These are temporary numbers assigned while we wait for an official local designation. These numbers are assigned in the 900-999 range.
These numbers are not official route numbers but just for assigning data to unnumbered routes.
descript.purpose: Route Segments was developed to fill a need at Mn/DOT for a continuous, statewide GIS base map of the transportation system.

timeperd.current: Route Segments represent the route network as they are reported to MnDOT following the construction season ending in the previous year and throughout the next year. State Trunk Highways, County State Aid Highways (CSAH) and Municipal State Aid Streets (MSAS) may be updated as they are received from MnDOT's State Aid Office.

theme.themekey: Roads, TIS Code, Route Number, Route Direction, Routes, Transportation

idinfo.accconst: The BaseMap is available to the public at no charge at <http://www.dot.state.mn.us/maps/gisbase/html/datafiles.html>. The data may also be requested through a submission of a written request to the Contact Person listed below.
idinfo.useconst: By accepting this data, the user agrees not to transmit this data or provide access to it or any part of it to another party or the public unless the user shall include with the data a copy of the disclaimer. The disclaimer can be found in Section 6 of this document (Distribution Liability).
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.6.1500

dataqual.logic: Data have been topologically structured and verified.
dataqual.complete: The layer is complete for the entire state of Minnesota.

horizpa.horizpar: Location accuracy for features derived from USGS 7.5-minute quadrangles cannot be assumed to exceed National Map Accuracy Standards for 1:24,000 scale maps (+/- 40 feet or 12 meters).

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

eainfo.overview: Attribute_Label: FID Attribute_Definition: Internal feature number. Attribute_Definition_Source: ESRI Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated. Attribute: Attribute_Label: SHAPE Attribute_Definition: Feature geometry. Attribute_Definition_Source: ESRI Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Coordinates defining the features. Attribute: Attribute_Label: STR_NAME Attribute_Definition: Displays the full street name. This is concatenated from STR_PFX, BASE_NAM, STR_TYPE and STR_SFX. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute: Attribute_Label: STR_PFX Attribute_Definition: Displays the prefix portion of the STR_NAME. In the example: "N Jackson St W", the STR_PFX would be "N". No periods are used. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: N Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: North Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: S Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: South Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: E Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: East Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: W Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: West Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: NE Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Northeast Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: NW Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Northwest Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: SE Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Southeast Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: SW Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Southwest Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute: Attribute_Label: BASE_NAM Attribute_Definition: Displays the name portion of the STR_NAME. In the example: "N Jackson St W", the BASE_NAM would be "Jackson". No periods are used and normally abbreviated words like Saint and Fort are spelled out. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute: Attribute_Label: STR_TYPE Attribute_Definition: Displays the type portion of the STR_NAME. In the example: "N Jackson St W", the STR_TYPE would be "St". No periods are used. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute: Attribute_Label: STR_SFX Attribute_Definition: Displays the suffix portion of the STR_NAME. In the example: "N Jackson St W", the STR_SFX would be "W". No periods are used. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: N Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: North Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: S Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: South Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: E Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: East Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: W Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: West Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: NE Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Northeast Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: NW Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Northwest Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: SE Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Southeast Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: SW Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Southwest Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute: Attribute_Label: E_911 Attribute_Definition: Attribute_Definition_Source: Enumerated_Domain_Value: Y Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Yes Attribute_Definition: Street name has been verified as being correct Enumerated_Domain_Value: N Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: No Attribute_Definition: No street name found Enumerated_Domain_Value: U Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Unverified Attribute_Definition: Street name has been placed but not sure if it is E911 verified Enumerated_Domain_Value: D Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Derived Attribute_Definition: No street name found but is populated with route number Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute: Attribute_Label: TIS_CODE Attribute_Definition: The unique identifier for the entire route within the state, using the following format: RRJJJJNNNNA where, RR = Route_System, JJJJ = Jurisdiction, defined as below based on Route_System (01, 02, 03 = 0000; 05, 10 = City Census Code; All others = XX00 where XX is XX = TIS County Code), NNNN = Route Number padded with leading zeros, and A = Alpha code on the end of particular routes or blank if none is present. Attribute_Domain_Values: Range_Domain: Range_Domain_Minimum: 0100000001 Range_Domain_Maximum: 2386009999Z Attribute: Attribute_Label: RTE_SYST Attribute_Definition: The Route System of the Route. Defined by the jurisdiction of the road. Attribute_Domain_Values: Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: 01 Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: Interstate Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: 02 Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: US Highway Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: 03 Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: MN Highway Attribute: Attribute_Label: RTE_NUM Attribute_Definition: This displays the number or letter of the road. For example, the road number for "County Road 22" would be "22", and the road number for "County Road F" would be "F". The ROAD_NUM field also includes trailing letters. For example, the road number for "Interstate 35W" would be "35W". Attribute: Attribute_Label: DIVID Attribute_Definition: Divided or One-way Indicator Attribute_Domain_Values: Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: M Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: The section of pavement is one half of a route divided by a physical median of some type. Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: O Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: The section of the route allows one way travel only Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: T Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: This section of the route allows travel in two directions Attribute_Label: TRAF_DIR Attribute_Definition: The direction of traffic flow along this segment of pavement. Attribute_Domain_Values: Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: I Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: The traffic flows towards the direction of increasing mileage only Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: D Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: The traffic flows towards the direction of decreasing mileage only Enumerated_Domain: Enumerated_Domain_Value: B Enumerated_Domain_Value_Definition: The traffic flows both directions Attribute: Attribute_Label: TIS_ONE Attribute_Definition: The unique identifier for the entire route within the state in the increasing direction unless it is a decreasing one way, using the following format: RRJJJJNNNNA where, RR = Route_System, JJJJ = Jurisdiction, defined as below based on Route_System (01, 02, 03 = 0000; 05, 10 = City Census Code; All others = XX00 where XX is XX = TIS County Code), NNNN = Route Number padded with leading zeros, and A = Alpha code on the end of particular routes or blank if none is present. Attribute_Domain_Values: Range_Domain: Range_Domain_Minimum: 0100000001 Range_Domain_Maximum: 2386009999Z Attribute: Attribute_Label: SHAPE_Leng Attribute_Definition: Length of feature in internal units. Attribute_Definition_Source: ESRI Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated. Attribute: Attribute_Label: CNTY_CODE Attribute_Definition: The county number as it is assigned numerical in alphabetical order Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Attribute: Attribute_Label: DIRECTIONA Attribute_Definition:The concatenation of TIS_CODE and TRAF_DIR where all B is given an I Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Attribute: Attribute_Label: BEGM Attribute_Definition:The begin mileage point for that record. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Attribute: Attribute_Label: ENDM Attribute_Definition:The end mileage point for that record. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Attribute_Label: BEGM Attribute_Definition: The beginning mileage at that point of that segment. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute: Attribute_Label: ENDM Attribute_Definition: The ending mileage at that point of that segment. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute: Attribute_Label: CNTY_CODE Attribute_Definition: A two digit number assigned in alphabetical order to each county. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute: Attribute_Label: DIRECTIONA Attribute_Definition: The direction of traffic in correspondence with mileage. Attribute_Definition_Source: Attribute_Domain_Values: Unrepresentable_Domain: Attribute:
